item.title: Parks on the Air
item.description: The Parks on the Air project is a thing.

item.title: Estate Sale
item.description: In October 2021, I attended the estate sale of a recently-passed Ham Radio operator (“silent key”). He had collected a wild variety of goodies over the years, a few of which caught my eye. I didn’t bring home nearly all of these, but I thought they were worth capturing.
